WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, server wasn't processing Tinkerings, it is now and verified it works
WorkItem.Description:
Synapse springs appears twice in Rawr, as a tinker and as an enchant.
Â 
However neither of those are loaded, when you load your character from Battle.net, even if you have the tinker attached to your gloves.

Comments.Message:
if you refer to browser cache, I have settings that clears everything but cookies everytime when I close Firefox.
I did, however, clear all cookies too and yet the Rawr does not load Synapse springs tinker, and there is an option to use them twice, as an enchant and as a tinker.
I tried this on Internet Explorer, which I never used, and there is exactly the same issue. I guess closing the item so quickly was not necessary.

Reset your Caches

Resolved(?) but I don't see any changes done.
Well sorry, it's just so easy to expect fixes go live immediately :P

Because the version with the fix hasn't been released yet.... do we really have to keep explaining this? We've said it a dozen times in the last couple of weeks.
